definitions.definition: A family or other group of wild wolves .
During World War II , any of various marauding groups of submarines , especially German submarines that patrolled the North Atlantic and preyed upon merchant ships .

main_definition: A family or other group of wild wolves .
secondary_definitions: ( historical , nautical , military ) During World War II , any of various marauding groups of submarines , especially German submarines that patrolled the North Atlantic and preyed upon merchant ships .
